content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure appears to be a toy train or similar vehicle made of blocks
- It consists of multiple sections and has multiple layers
- Colors used: red, yellow, green, blue, and orange
- There are approximately 11-12 distinct blocks used

Block Arrangement:
1. Base layer: Red arch blocks forming the base/wheels
2. Middle layer: Yellow cylindrical blocks on top of red arches, green rectangular blocks
3. Top layer: Yellow tall blocks, blue cube with orange roof

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 2 (red arch block - right)
    Step2: Move block with index 6 (green horizontal block - on top of right arch)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (red arch block - middle)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (red arch block - left)
    Step5: Move block with index 12 (yellow cylindrical block - right)
    Step6: Move block with index 12 (yellow cylindrical block - middle)
    Step7: Move block with index 12 (yellow cylindrical block - left)
    Step8: Move block with index 7 (green vertical block - behind right arch)
    Step9: Move block with index 7 (green vertical block - behind left arch)
    Step10: Move block with index 11 (yellow tall block - right back)
    Step11: Move block with index 11 (yellow tall block - left back)
    Step12: Move block with index 3 (blue cube - rightmost)
    Step13: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular roof - on top of blue cube)
}

This sequence will create the complete structure as shown in the target image, maintaining all spatial relationships and orientations of the blocks.
